ai-ja310:1.1_0: Endowed, the explanation of the Buddha,
ai-ja310:2.1_0: The curse it is the obtaining of fame,
ai-ja310:2.2_0: And the obtaining of wealth, brahmin;
ai-ja310:2.3_0: These things come with a low rebirth,
ai-ja310:3.1_0: Those who have attained it himself
ai-ja310:3.2_0: and have gone forth from home to homelessness.
ai-ja310:3.3_0: It’s better to live happily is better
ai-ja310:4.1_0: Those who have attained it himself
ai-ja310:4.2_0: and have gone forth from home to homelessness.
ai-ja310:5.1_0: After subsequently the tenth year (birth) is produced.
ai-ja310:5.2_0: The first sub-chapter on scents is finished.
ai-ja310:7.3_0: Then the Koliyan lady who had drawn near,
ai-ja310:7.4_0: he wanders around the sea of the ocean.
